document.full_text: afghanistan and pakistan have upgraded a joint commission for peace in a bid to end afghanistan's near-decade old insurgency, and have the support of the u.s. for the move, leaders of the two countries said on saturday.
document.title: afghanistan, pakistan upgrade peace efforts
lines_and_colors: afghanistan and pakistan have upgraded a joint commission for peace in a bid to end afghanistan's near-decade old insurgency, and have the support of the u.s. for the move, leaders of the two countries said on saturday.
